fast3d.util

Class Sort

  • java.lang.Object
    • fast3d.util.Sort

  • public abstract class Sort
extends java.lang.Object
    in a 3d-environment some objects may cover others, so it is important to detect the order (far to near) in which to render objects
    the nested classes offer static methods to sort like described by the algorithms they are named like
    users should normally use Sort._Algorithm_.Renderables.sort(Vector3d cameraPosition, Renderable... array); or Sort._Algorithm_.Vectors.sort(Vector3d cameraPosition, Vector3d... array);
    Author:
    Tim Trense

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Sort.Bubblesort
      Bubblesort is usually quite slow, but very fast if the array is pre-sorted
      static class  Sort.Quicksort
      Quicksort is generally the best, because fastest, way of sorting an array, but is very slow if the array is pre-sorted

      Sort()
